title: Blood Moon Thresh
body: Riot Games you have no right to take away my Blood Moon Thresh that my friend gifted too me, I DEMAND THE SKIN BACK THAT MY FRIEND PAIED MONEY FOR It is not on my account anymore even though earlier in the months it was. I DEMAND YOU PUT IT BACK ON MY ACCOUNT ME AND MY FRIEND ARE VERY DISAPPOINTED IN THE SERVICE WE RECEIVED DURING OUR HIS GIFTING TRANSACTION AND WE EITHER WANT ME TOO HAVE my Blood Moon Thresh back or we want a refund of RP back on my friends account. Seriously this is really freaking lame like what the hell!?!? We officially wasted our money...

replies.body:
Hey TwistedDeathray,

If content has been removed from your account, it's likely due to one of two reasons: 

1) If a player participates in Refer-A-Friend fraud to acquire IP or RP, then any champions/skins gifted with this IP or RP are removed.

2) If a player purchases RP and gifts content with it, and subsequently issues a chargeback for the money spent on that RP, we will remove that content.

If you don't think this is why the content was removed, you can [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and we can investigate!

Hello Riot Games, It has been 9 months and this issue hasn't been resolved I am slightly still irritated that no one has gotten back to me within this amount of time. I Have had a friend gift me a skin and then it has been removed from my account after about a month and a half, 9 months ago. I would appreciate it if I could get my skin back that you have removed from my account, sorry for the in convince of this ticket and have a wonderful night Riot Games.

They would be happy to assist you if you submitted a ticket calmly explaining the situation.
Or they are working on it, and you will get it back eventually anyway.

You know, I had the same thing happen to me. A friend of mine's account had been in refer-a-friend fraud, but he also had paid legitimate money to get skins for himself and I. Like, I SAW him in person, at his house, pay with his card and get skins with it while we were hanging out. And then Rito took not only the stuff he'd gotten with the fraudulent RP, but the stuff he'd bought as well.

Meh, it's been a while though, and I've since moved on. Still sucked when it happened though. :(
